about_the_game:
A narrative-driven, single-player adventure like mom used to make, with a charming cast of characters and a touching story of self-discovery.

Discover a New World - Venture beyond the world you know to the world of the unknown. The land is full of secrets to uncover, weird wonderful characters you will meet along the way, and friends you will make!

Learn to Defend Yourself - Utilize melee weapons, slingshots, and an array of other weapons to defend yourself from creatures who look to harm you.

Find the truth - Bo is alone and doesn't know where his family has gone. uncover who these strangers are in this world and where your family has gone.
